pkgmetadata.longdescription: Convert Decimals to Fractions // Provides functions for converting decimals to a matrix of numerators and denominators or a character vector of fractions. Supports mixed or improper fractions, finding common denominators for vectors of fractions, limiting denominators to powers of ten, and limiting denominators to a maximum value. Also includes helper functions for finding the least common multiple and greatest common divisor for a vector of integers. Implemented using C++ for maximum speed.
